t: Ex-Microsoft exec Panos Panay will head Amazon's Devices business | TechCrunch

t: Interview: Panos Panay on the future of Amazon’s Kindle | The Verge
s: Amazon launched four new Kindles this week, maybe the biggest single launch day in the 17-year history of the company’s wildly successful e-reader. One of them even comes in color! It is very much not a coincidence that the launch happened roughly a year after Panos Panay joined the company.
